title: Relic Shield items execution need to be higher
body:
In mid and late game executing minions with the Relic shield item line SUCKS! How can I stay a tank when no one lets me use my charges? Its bad enough I can only execute when there's a chaperone and I cant farm the big blobs my team neglects.

Want more support players? Please do this.

replies.body: Also, make Thresh's auto attack proc the execute.

He is ranged.

Use the passive damage on Flay.
he haS such low ad that its hard for him to execute
OH dear god yes!  I entirely switched over to {{item:3301}} because I'd mess up the proc sometimes and this enrages most ADCs.
you can execute ranged minions when they are at full HP in the mid to late game... melees you need to weaken them slightly and cannons obviously more than melees.

What.

Cant tell if troll or just.. bad. You know it does not execute on ranged attacks, right? You can also use abilities that do higher damage.

Honestly though, Relic shield line is my least favorite.  I feel like (NO Proof) that it just earns you way less money through the game.  So many times mid-late game I don't even get to LOOK at the minion line before the mid laner blows it up.  This is fine if you're Coin or Spellthief, but Relic shield is just ... so bad for money I feel.  I sit there with 3 - 4 orbs (depending on how far it's upgraded) 75% of the time, where coin and thief are constantly genearting you money still most likely
This is why riot needs to replace relic shield line with a modified [murksphere](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Murksphere) line.
this is why ancient coin is better then relic shield. so what your losing 300hp but to gain mana regen and better hp regen and better gold income and 10% cd
I just wish zzs allowed executes procs
Mid- late game its enough to pretty much 100-0 a minion with it, Id say the bigger problem is people just clearing the wave before you even get to auto a minion.
This and also let Thresh's autos execute if he walks into melee range, I've seen so many people struggle with getting the minion kills with him even with his e damage
